item.title: Zebradog
item.description: Lessons Learned You can teach an old dog (pun intended) new tricks: teaching a 20-year-old organization how to be more agile has its challenges and benefits. Interactive multimedia ("environmental graphic design") is a unique design/technology challenge, and while testing is important, it's mostly in the form of dogfooding (yes, pun also intended). Your users, in this setting, are passersby. They have no idea what you're building, and there aren't any trends to rely on, so designing for discoverability is crucial.
